captions.text: Hi, my name is Otário (Sucker).
Can you see this product here?
It's the Creamy Cookie from Bauducco!

It's a special Bauducco's family recipe,
made with selected ingredients!
Filled with a delicious Hazelnut creamy!

It looks nice, huh?
It makes you want to eat it!
Let's see how is it inside?
[Opening the package]

Can you see it here?
Guess what?!
Are you (Baucucco) fucking kidding me?

No!
Look at this packaging!

No! Take a close look!
Look!
Look at the filling.
Look at the layer of biscuit.
Look at the chocolate topping.
Am I too demanding?
Or the cookie that they make is a SHIT!
Where's the FUCKING hazelnut creamy filling?

I'm impressed with these graphic designers!
Bauducco if fucking kidding with us, right?!

Damn! I bought THAT!
I did not buy this!

Put this shit right here on the packaging!
Not a ficticious pack which product does not exists!

You (Bauducco) are selling this shit,
but you are putting this thing on the packaging.
So, use a fucking transparent package.

since you guys (Bauducco) do not have the CAPACITY
to draw such product here.

It's awful, you guys make an awful product.
So, put a fucking awful product on the cover!
Don't try to fool me motherfucker!

Be honest with your customers,
Don't try to fool people.

I appeal to these companies,
those who do these fucking cute cover packaging

Damn, makes an honest business then!
Make the good product!

Or asks to Bauducco to do the fucking right product, that you guys imagined.
But Bauducco is making shit!

Look at this, look, look here ...
Look at the filling!

LOOK AT THE FILLING!
Look at the size of the biscuit!
Look at the layer of biscuit!

Look at the layer of this shit right here, dude!
They are trying to fuck me!

This cookie is  ... HARD!
It's not creamy.

Selected ingredients?!
Only if it was selected in the fucking garbage!

Do you (consumers) want to be fooled?!
So, keep buying this crap here!
Creamy Cookie from Bauducco!

You (Bauducco) took my money!
But I'll fuck you guys!
Do not buy this crap!

comments.author: Rafael Demboscki

comments.text:
O que é normal é o mundo tentar enganar. Quando percebo isso, ignoro o 
produto, não compro. Não tem coisa pior para a marca do que ter venda ruim. 
Se o produto ainda tá nas prateleiras, é porque tem gente que gosta. E aí? 
Adianta se revoltar?
O que eu acho que seria bem mais digno de um vídeo seria falar sobre o bis, 
que diminuiu em 1 bis por caixa, rateando o peso para todos os outros 
"bises" da caixa, e não deixou claro isso para o consumidor e manteve o 
preço. Isso sim, é sacanagem.
